entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR THIS EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN CLEARING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

CLEAR
AREAS OF FROST AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

WIDESPREAD FROST IN THE MORNING
SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 60
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

CLEAR
AREAS OF FROST AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

AREAS OF FROST IN THE MORNING
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
LOWS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
